topic.name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Parts of Speech and Word Functions in Language Arts & Humanities

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify simple pronouns (I, you, he, she, it, we, they).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify adjectives as words that describe things.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify adverbs as words that describe actions (often ending in -ly).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify that the same word can do different jobs (e.g., 'I *run*' vs. 'A long *run*').

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify when a noun is acting like an adjective (e.g., 'chicken' soup).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify nouns as names for a person, place, thing, or idea.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify the function of a noun in a sentence (Subject or Object).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify position words (in, on, under, beside).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify prepositional phrases in a sentence.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify verbs as 'doing' words or 'being' words.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify helping verbs (is, am, are, was, were).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Identify the main verb phrase in a sentence.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Recognize that words have jobs in a sentence.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Observe that word order matters.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Recognize that some words connect ideas.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Change verbs to show past, present, and future (simple tenses).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use describing words to make sentences more interesting.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Sort words into 'Describing a Thing' vs. 'Describing an Action'.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Categorize adjectives by what they tell (Which one? What kind? How many?).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Form comparative (-er) and superlative (-est) adjectives correctly.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use adverbs to modify verbs, adjectives, and other adverbs.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Distinguish between 'Good' (adjective) and 'Well' (adverb).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain the order of adjectives (Quantity, Quality, Size, Age, Shape, Color, Origin, Material).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the use of a dangling modifier (or correct it).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Sort words into 'Nouns' and 'Verbs' based on how they are used.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain how a word like 'paint' can be a noun or a verb.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain why dictionaries list multiple parts of speech for one word.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the flexibility of English morphology.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Distinguish between common (city) and proper (London) nouns.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Form plural nouns by adding -s or -es.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Capitalize proper nouns in own writing.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Categorize nouns as abstract (courage), concrete (rock), or collective (herd).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Form possessive nouns correctly (singular and plural).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use appositives to rename nouns.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain the function of a noun clause.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the capitalization of theological terms based on style guides.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use 'and', 'but', and 'or' to join words.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Follow instructions with positional words.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use subordinating conjunctions (because, since, if) to make complex sentences.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain the object of a preposition.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain how prepositions show relationships of time and space.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the use of polysyndeton or asyndeton in rhetoric.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Replace a name with the correct pronoun.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use 'I' correctly when talking about self.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Match pronouns to the person they are talking about.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Categorize pronouns by type (Personal, Possessive, Reflexive).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Ensure pronouns agree with their antecedents in number and gender.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use relative pronouns (who, which, that) to start clauses.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Distinguish between subject pronouns (I) and object pronouns (me).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain the function of indefinite pronouns and verb agreement.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the grammatical logic of pronoun case in elliptical clauses (e.g., 'taller than I').

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Match verbs to the subject (He runs, They run).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Categorize verbs as Action, Linking, or Helping.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Form perfect tenses (have/had + participle) correctly.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Use irregular verbs correctly in the past tense.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Explain how modal verbs (might, should, must) change meaning.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Defend the use of the Subjunctive Mood for hypothetical situations.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the placement of modifiers to avoid confusion.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the use of intensifiers (very, really, quite).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect predicate adjectives to linking verbs.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Compare the form of a word with its function.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Apply knowledge of parts of speech to fix sentences.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze words that function as different parts of speech depending on context.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the function of a word based on its suffix.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect sentence diagramming to determining function.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the role of nominalization (turning verbs/adjectives into nouns).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the difference between count and non-count nouns.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect noun usage to subject-verb agreement in complex sentences.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect ideas logically using transition words.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the function of correlative conjunctions (either/or, neither/nor).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the difference between a preposition and an adverb.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect the use of conjunctions to sentence flow.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the case of pronouns (Nominative, Objective, Possessive).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the correct usage of 'Who' vs. 'Whom'.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect demonstrative pronouns to the pointing function.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the three moods of verbs: Indicative, Imperative, Subjunctive.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the difference between Active and Passive voice.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Connect verb aspect (Progressive, Perfect) to the timing of an action.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the overuse of adverbs (show, don't tell).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the grammatical correctness of functional shifts.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the stylistic effect of abstract vs. concrete nouns.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the stylistic choice of ending a sentence with a preposition.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the use of the 'editorial we' or formal registers.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the rhetorical effect of using the Passive Voice.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct sentences with nuanced modification.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize adjectival clauses for precise description.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct sentences where words shift function for rhetorical effect (anthimeria).

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize form and function in linguistic analysis.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct sentences using sophisticated nominal structures.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize noun functions within gerund phrases.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct complex sentences using varied connective logic.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize prepositional phrases acting as adjectives or adverbs.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct sentences avoiding ambiguous antecedents.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the use of reflexive pronouns for emphasis.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Construct complex sentences maintaining consistent verb tense.

objectives.topic_name: Parts of Speech and Word Functions
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize verb choice to strengthen writing (strong verbs vs. adverbs).
